title: Pixel 4a Camera not working. Tried all of help center tips and instructions. No good outcomes
content:
Tried all the things.
I tried clearing the caches. I tried updating the updating the device. I tried to updating the app I've tried restarting the app .I trade safe restart. I even contacted where I purchased the device , their support was no help. All other connected apps cannot function such as Google lenses or Instagram or SnapChat etc etc. I've seen many community posts of this widespread issue with the pixel phones please can I have a viable solution or should I repurchase a new phone!!!
